website_summaries.verdict: Low price for a simple security cable. Offers a four-number combination dial on the lock, and you can set the number.
pros: Works with any laptop or other electronic device that contains a Kensington security slot
Has a six-foot cable length, which should meet the needs of most people
Offered in six different cable colors to match your device
cons: Build quality is questionable, as dials may become stuck in place over time

customer_reviews.title: You Need a Tiny Screwdriver to Set the Combo
customer_reviews.text: You get to choose the color so that's nice. This Sendt is similar to a genuine Kensington lock in design and ruggedness. You do need a tiny screwdriver to set the combination which many people won't have. You can get a kit of small screwdrivers at many dollar stores. You don't need a high-quality screwdriver here - most people will never need that screwdriver again. The lock is easy to use. The plastic-coated wire is 6' long (too long in my opinion). As always, the thing wants to unwind and straighten itself out when stored in your laptop bag which is annoying. I have another lock made by Kensington that wants to coil itself back up which is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great value for these security cables. I was impressed with the build quality and ease of use. The cable can rotate freely where it attaches to the locking mechanism, so it's easy to put on and take off of any device. I bought several of these to take on an extended business trip, and used them on a laptop, monitor, and Xbox One. Once it was attached to the device it held on really well and did not feel loose in the security port on any of the devices.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money, Beware of the Default Combination
customer_reviews.text: The price for what you get is fair. This can definitely help prevent a run-through robbery (common in my neighborhood), though anyone with any kind of cutters or time can crack this thing open, but that's nearly all security cables. My biggest warning is to take note of the combination it comes with. Mine must have been a return as the combination was NOT set to 0000. This resulted in me permanently locking it to my computer, and then spending an hour watching videos on how to recognize the feeling of tumblers clicking as I worked out the original combination so I could change it to my own.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Bigbee

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Easy to read the numbers
customer_reviews.text: Overall easy to read and use, Had to wiggle it in the Kensington slot on my laptop a little to engage but it seems to work fine. Read the instructions as you need to rotate the lock in the Kensignton slot to engage. For me, the white numbers on black background are much easier to read vs the black numbers on shiny silver dials I had with another brand,
customer_reviews.author: CAPT Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good lock of its type
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality version of this type of product to prevent casual theft (no product of this type will prevent a professional or someone with a bolt cutter or a saw or drill and some time). Cable swivels on lock to allow best positioning. Easy to set code. Makes a very satisfying click when it locks. At least for my slot, the code location ends up parallel with the desk, which makes it hard to read, but I just set my code based on the numbers in the next column which are easier to read. Suggestion to manufacturer: Make the code column 45-60 degrees from the horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: Mikie

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great, hard to lock in and remove at times
customer_reviews.text: Most of the locks like this that I've used before - the locking T turns when you unlock them. This one you have to turn the whole mechanism to remove it or lock it into place, which I have found to be difficult at times. I really wanted the combination lock so that I didn't have to worry about losing the key.
customer_reviews.author: A. Heick

customer_reviews.title: Worked Okay, but not ideal for my HP
customer_reviews.text: This worked out okay -- I felt much more comfortable leaving my laptop in my room, secured with this cable. The one problem I found was that I could not secure my laptop and have it plugged in at the same time. My HP's power cord plugged in too close to the slot and the lock was too big to fit both in that close. So, I would have to unlock when I wanted to be able to plug in, and then remember to lock it back up when I left.
customer_reviews.author: LDKennedy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I occasionally do research in a large public library where it is a bad idea to leave your computer unattended even for a minute. Takes only a few seconds to wrap the cable around a table leg and insert the combination end into the lock hole on my laptop. Strong enough to deter all but the most determined thief, and definitely keeps at bay the grab-and-run variety. I haven't had a problem with the combination mechanism not allowing my computer to lie flat, but I could see that as an issue if you have a super thin computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good looks
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, well made and attractive. It sticks out pretty far. It certainly won't go unnoticed, but it has tasteful design with a nice finish and won't uglify a high end laptop. FYI, you'll need a small flathead screwdriver to set the combination. All the devices I've attached these locks to connected easily and securely. If I need more of these kinds of locks, this is the one I'll get.
customer_reviews.author: MinneMan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving it, the code 0000 doesn't allow me to press the button down- I'm assuming it was set wrong at the factory. Since I can't lock/unlock it, it's useless. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to set up
customer_reviews.text: It was so difficult to try and set the combination on this lock that I actually started to bleed. And I never did get it to work so I sent it back. I spent about an hour with the product and YouTube videos trying to get this thing set up.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive product
customer_reviews.text: Use this while going into the 'field' (auditing on site). Easy to set the combination and use. The only criticism is that when locking, you have to turn it just right to allow for spinning the numbers to cause it to lock.
customer_reviews.author: Just_the_Facts

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and a pretty solid lock.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this product is pretty solid. I bought others in the same price range, and they looked like security locks at best. This one fits well, does not slip out, and it's not flimsy. If you're looking high security, the key and "T" style locks are the way to go and I use them on my high end electronics, but this lock will do it's job. It does it well enough that I'm ordering 2 more of them to use on my LED flat screens. It doesn't say on the package, but I think the cable length is between 4 and 5 feet long.
customer_reviews.author: anthony botano

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to use and seems sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use and seems sturdy enough. I'm sure I could cut it if I had the right tools but it would definitely discourage petty theft. Perfect length I think as it wraps around whatever object I use (usually a chair) with enough room to get it to the desk and have enough wiggle room to move around. It's perfect for long study sessions at the library so I can use the restroom without major fear of having my laptop stolen and having to carry it all with me.
customer_reviews.author: sharpcasper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lock
customer_reviews.text: High quality feel to it. Tumbler moves effortlessly. Really like how the mechanism is made to pivot. My old lock I often had to pick my laptop up and look at uncomfortable angles to try and get the codes right. With this lock, the tumbler/lock actually pivots so that you can have the front facing any of the 4 directions you wish...which makes it very convenient for a quick lock/unlock. This lock did not smell chemically, as some of the cheaper laptop locks I bought here on Amazon did. I highly recommend this lock.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laptop lock I've ever used! You wouldn't think it's something to get excited about, but there are lots of little features on this gizmo that set it apart from others. Especially useful to me: - Cable is hinged where it attaches to lock AND also has a collar that pivots freely around the lock, making it easy to place just about anywhere and to anything without the cable being in the way. - Changing combo is simple and easy, but virtually no chance of resetting it accidentally. - Bright red color makes me less likely to lose it! Spend a few extra bucks for this model instead of the bare-bones version and you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: For your peace of mind with electronics
customer_reviews.text: While at a conference, I knew I would have to occasionally walk away or at least not have my eyes on my laptop at every moment. This resolved all my worries. Recommend for peace of mind..
customer_reviews.author: P. Frick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and secure.
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than a key lock. You don't have to hold onto a tiny key going through TSA and it fits very snug, not loose like some of the key lock types. Gives you confidence it will last a while. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: arrived with locking screw permanently stuck in horizontal position, could not budge , even when putting in original , factory set 0000 combination. Junk. oh, and I went out to buy a replacement. Bought a Targus Defcon Cl laptop cable lock from Target on short notice, you set it the same way, it worked perfectly and is re-settable besides. How do I get my money back for the sendt junk?
customer_reviews.author: bookalot23

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Got it. Put it on my laptop after setting the combination I wanted to use (there are good YouTube videos showing how to set the combination) and all is well. Nice knowing you have an extra layer of security as laptops may be so easy for someone to pckup and walk away with if you're not careful. This hasn't been tested against a thief yet and hopefully never will.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: great laptop security cable
customer_reviews.text: THEE LAPTOP CABLE TO OWN!! very well built. sturdy. cable encased in protective rubber coating. the color is exactly as vivid as shown in pic. easy to operate. gives a piece of mind. highly recommend & would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Frank

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fit Dell Inspiron 13
customer_reviews.text: Not universal enough. It doesn't fit the lock port on my Dell Inspiron 13 (3mm). It fit's my husband's Macbook (5mm) but he doesn't need a lock. Also shipping back the lock costs as much as the refund. Not worthy. Disappointed. The seller should specify the size of the lock since it's clearly not standard.
customer_reviews.author: Croky

customer_reviews.title: Lock it up!
customer_reviews.text: Gives me a great piece of mine securing my gov computer. Love the color. Good length on the cord
customer_reviews.author: ken1956

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good combination lock
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good combination lock. The lock itself is very flimsy and when turning the number combinations it was very hard to set the correct combination that I wanted. It overall feels very cheap and I would, as many others have, recommend buying a laptop lock that uses a key rather than a combination.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Only one annoyance
customer_reviews.text: So this functions well enough but only have one little complaint. Taking it off is fine but putting it on it is a little finicky and you have to wait for the click. Minor annoyance but it does the job and is handy to keep those happenstance thieves from grabbing it. Someone more determined will still succeed.
customer_reviews.author: jpaul

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH MACBOOK PRO
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our twins for graduation for their brand new computers (also a graduation gift) and didn't "inspect" them until dorm move-in day, LONG after the "return window" had passed. Although several people said they were compatible with macbook pros, they are not, and now I'm out $26 since I can't return them. UGH!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: don’t get unless you want one that’s already locked from previous owner
customer_reviews.text: Literally locked upon buying. This is absolutely ridiculous. The screw was already locked, not allowing me to turn it and reset a new passcode. I tried it with actual small screw drivers, tweezers, everything and it will not push in and turn. And 0000 DOESNT unlock it. Thanks for nothing. Y’all will be hearing from me lmao
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: FUN TO USE - GOOD THEFT DETERRENT
customer_reviews.text: Actually seemed more solid and better quality than I expected, although my expectations were pretty low given the price. Used it extensively in my travels this summer as a theft deterrent in hotel rooms - only problem was finding something secure to loop it around! I would emphasize that this is ONLY a deterrent - I think you would be hard-pressed to find something really robust when the thing could probably be snapped off by someone determined - not to mention the fact that your hard drive could be removed (and your data with it).
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: My first laptop lock, very pretty pink color. Any cable can be cut, that includes the U-shaped bike locks, so you're never going to be totally secure, but I think the deterrent value is there as far as a university setting. Wish it fit a little more snug against my computer, but It would still but the side off my computer for someone to try and pull it/break it off.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Unlock Fail
customer_reviews.text: Total product fail. Reset unlock code. Tested it twice and worked fine. Installed on computer now trying to get off and code doesn't work! Going to have to cut the ^(*&^&^%%^&*&*^ thing off today. Be careful if you decide to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Schmidt_R

customer_reviews.title: Make Thieves Fight For It!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to secure myto a big table, through where the leg attaches to the top. The idea here is deterrence, not absolute security, as break-ins are typically grab-n-go. I'd of given it 5-stars but for the fact that the locking onto the unit part, was troublesome, as was setting the code. But once you get it set-up its good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Andrew Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Want really useful for me
customer_reviews.text: It wasnt so helpful in my case as i have the new macbook
customer_reviews.author: raj

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit either my Dell inspirion 15" uhd laptop or my new chromebook 2 by Samsung. Same size lock slot on both. I plan to file both sides of the t stud down to fit and hope it will then work. Right now it does not. This is my first lock. It is well made and I easily changed the combination.
customer_reviews.author: Lance E. PearsonTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed. A nice slick lock.
customer_reviews.text: The readout on this lock is great. Too many times with other locks, I've dialed in my unlock code, only to realize that I was lining up the numbers on the wrong side. The numbers line up in their own little round windows, and the white shows up very clearly on black, making it very easy to unlock in dark situations. Cable seems a little flimsy, but is certainly enough to keep an opportunistic thief from walking away with the goods.
customer_reviews.author: Don't Stop Banana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel cable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and flexible to lock up your stuff
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Baeza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up your own combination and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this recently so I could do a little work while on vacation in Mexico this past October. Easy to set up and my laptop didn't get stolen even though I left it out on a desk in our room the whole time during our week-long stay (locked up with this product, of course). So I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: WOn't stop much beyond an auditor...  but that's what I needed...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and puts me in compliance with my work requirements! I'm pretty sure anyone who truly wants to steal a laptop won't be deterred by this if they had any planning before their actions but it puts me in compliance for my work and is easy to use. Would stop a person who is just running by and grabbing though.. so win there? Win for me!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Bee

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock
customer_reviews.text: This does what it's supposed to, keeping someone from making a grab and go theft of a laptop. It wouldn't stand up to a determined theif with bolt cutters, but it's not designed to either. Contrary to what some have reported, the locking mechanismmfunctions smoothly and the nubers are clear (provided you install it right-side up, that is).
customer_reviews.author: T. Rainman

customer_reviews.title: Nice thing about it is it looks like a regular ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what it is. Nice thing about it is it looks like a regular cable that comes out of your laptop especially if you use a MacBook and got the white version. Only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because the locking mechanism is somewhat clunky to use but for the price you cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection
customer_reviews.text: An excellent way to keep your stuff safe. Make sure it is compatible with your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: AMYS/JAYA

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the money. Used it for the 1st time this week while working a table at a benefit fair. Looped the cable around the folding table leg and also through my briefcase handle. The cable was the right length and it folded up nicely into my briefcase. It was easy to set the new combination. Just be the circles with the combination are pointed up so you can easily see the numbers to unlock it.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly good theft deterrent and protection, less bulk
customer_reviews.text: The advantage to this cable lock is that it's less bulky than others mostly because the cable is thinner. If you consider this type of lock a deterrent to casual theft, it is more than sufficient. If you plan on locking something up more permanently, maybe you should go for a thicker cable. I like the red color to - adds to the deterrent effect. Can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas ParkerTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Troublesome article
customer_reviews.text: You have try several times each time to lock you laptop
customer_reviews.author: Camilo

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GOOD. CLEAR INSTRUCTIONS.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. The instructions were very clear, making it easy to change the combination. Took me a moment to figure out the idea was to slide the tab in, *and then twist it, so it can't come out* and then roll the combo to lock it. However, that was due my own problem with spatial relationships.
customer_reviews.author: RevTom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy, easy to use and a pretty color. You will need a tiny Philip's screwdriver to set your combination but after that it is really a good accessory to have if you use your laptop in public. No one wants to have to pack everything up and lose that prime spot in Starbuck's with the wide table and outlet just to go to the bathroom. It's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Takia

customer_reviews.title: Like it...
customer_reviews.text: There is some simple way to unlock this type of locks without code. I got used lock (DIFFERENT manufacturer), spent half of hour to understand idea and one minute to unlock it without code. Surprisingly, this method didn't work with THIS lock... Happy!
customer_reviews.author: VVK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Serves its purpose. Bought lots more for computer lab at school. Only downside is that if kids have enough free time, they can figure out the combination. But we figured in a school setting, keeping up with 30 keys for a lab would be too cumbersome, so combination was the most practical.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Also, lock head swivels so you can attach it at whatever angle works for your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: K. West

customer_reviews.title: Not for all laptops.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my laptop. Requires the ability to "pivot" the lock after inserting. My laptop's lock hole does not allow that.
customer_reviews.author: David White

customer_reviews.title: Very Good, Good Materials
customer_reviews.text: Very good and solid. I like it because you can see the internal material of the cable, and the lock itself has the feeling of solidity.
customer_reviews.author: M.Y.JB

customer_reviews.title: More convenient than keylock version
customer_reviews.text: It works just as you would want. I prefer this to the keylock version the company I work for supplied. There is no key to lose or misplace. My laptop is sucure (as required by my employer) when I'm away from my desk or when I leave the laptop at work overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: lovely product easy to handle dont have to worry can live my ...
customer_reviews.text: lovely product easy to handle dont have to worry can live my laptop at the cafe with rest of mind.
customer_reviews.author: EDWIN

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and very good quality. I don't know why some people says that they cannot open it or they cannot change the password. mine is very good. The password wheels are smooth, and everything is functioning normally.
customer_reviews.author: Mingde Li

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR MACBOOKS
customer_reviews.text: Not for Mac books. Some people with intelligence would have seen this but I did not. Other than that it looks pretty nice, just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby hatch

customer_reviews.title: Makes great hood pin canles
customer_reviews.text: We cut the locks off and used these for fiberglass hood pin cables. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazo

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product weekly to secure my computer at events. Works great and keeps me compliant with my industry regulations.
customer_reviews.author: John McGlynn

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my laptop, but did not work on my sons laptop because of the angle of the slot to put the lock in. Make sure you look at the picture to see the direction of the lock (vertical vs horizontal). We ended up returning this one for the Kensington K64673AM model.
customer_reviews.author: anossal

customer_reviews.title: Very poor. The locking mechanism gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: Very poor. The locking mechanism gets stuck. Scary actually, since if you can't unstick it, you've got real trouble
customer_reviews.author: Cool Guy

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but functional lock
customer_reviews.text: It ties your Kensington compatible device to something, preferably big and heavy, to deter would-be thieves. It performs that function admirably. My only complaint is that the numbers are counter-clockwise, and thus counter-intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: jerm1027

customer_reviews.title: The lock seems sturdy enough but does not come with the built on ...
customer_reviews.text: The lock seems sturdy enough but does not come with the built on velcro strap other models do so it is hard to keep it coiled up in backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Anderson

customer_reviews.title: nice hinge and easy to set
customer_reviews.text: The hinge at the end of the cable allows for flexibility that many other combo locks do not have. It was relatively easy to set my own combo using a small screwdriver. Now all that I have to do is to remember what it is.
customer_reviews.author: C Gin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy lock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to lock my daughter's laptop in her dorm room. Setting up the combination was easy, and it's sturdy enough that it should discourage any would-be thieves.
customer_reviews.author: Texas23

customer_reviews.title: Really glad to have this
customer_reviews.text: Such peace of mind as I go to different locations and like being able to walk away and not worry.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie B

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works exactly as listed! I bought this lock for a laptop that stays in a classroom where I work and it has deterred thieves from picking it up and walking out. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Still better have insurance.
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a month. A thief can easily remove this unit. But not sure if there is any much better. Just a deterrent a bit but have insurance. With Kensington it would damage the computer, which would defeat the purpose of stealing. This does no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: locks work great and they're impossible to beat for the price. I bought several for locking up equipment during a convention and was very happy with the operation of each of the 6. Other more expensive options might be 'better' somehow, but this definitely did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: I had previously rated as, "piece of junk". Now that I have a replacement unit, I realized that it is not that bad. It is a good deterrent, but as is the case with all such devices, it is not foolproof. Vendor has great service though.
customer_reviews.author: Raoon Kundi

customer_reviews.title: I have a Macbook Pro (no retina display) and this lock is perfect for it
customer_reviews.text: I'm an incoming college freshman, so naturally I began my search for a reliable laptop lock. I have a Macbook Pro (no retina display) and this lock is perfect for it. It was really simple to set up and I had no issues. I recommend this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Settimo

customer_reviews.title: But cable is good and strong and overall it will work just fine ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to keep my laptop safe while I am in and out of my hotel room. Changing combination could be just a little easier. You need to have a screw driver to turn the tiny little screw in order to change the combination. I don't always have a screw driver handy when I travel so changing "on the fly" could be a little tricky. But cable is good and strong and overall it will work just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M Payton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: It came 6 days earlier than originally notified. Trying it out, it worked flawlessly. For the price, I could not ask for more. It fits nice and tight, locks and unlocks great. The cable seem a little thin, but then if it was thick, it would cost more. For the purpose I plan, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly so far
customer_reviews.text: This lock works perfectly with my Sony Vaio. The combination is easy to set if you have a small screwdriver. I purchased this one because of the settable combination and no key to keep track of. It was exactly what I was looking for and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: PnwThomas

customer_reviews.title: Laptop protection
customer_reviews.text: This laptop lock was ordered for my son going away to college. He takes his laptop to many places on campus and likes having a way to keep it more secure. The combination lock is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for Lenovo Flex 4 Notebook!
customer_reviews.text: Says it works for most laptops and computers but didn't work for my Lenovo notebook which tapers off at the edges and therefore the lug insert does not have enough space to turn to lock position. Unfortunately I only realized this beyond the return window so I'm now left with a fully functional cable I don't need.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Mohamedali P.E. PMP

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: It's a more than adequate solution. The cable is sturdy and I don't believe can be compromised without a decent cable cutter. An excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Taffuri

customer_reviews.title: Good for Money!
customer_reviews.text: Works good for us. Only problem is to locate good place to anchor it. However it is fine with little planning. We use 2 of these. I feel much better. This will slow down potential burglar. It is not the best mechanism I seen. However it is very good for money!
customer_reviews.author: mmihalj

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. This lock is not thick enough. If there is some thief wants your laptop, the lock cannot stop it.... But if you just use it in a safer place. it is a good choice with reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for computer protection on campus or in a coffee shop.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great price, works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this lock everyday for my laptop, and have no complaints. It works great. It was easy to set the code, and locking/unlocking is simple. Great price compared to local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good basic security
customer_reviews.text: This cable will deter a casual thief from snatching a laptop when attached. It is lightweight and easy to attach once you get the hang of it. Like most security devices, it is only a deterrent so you need to be smart about when to use it and when not to rely on it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lock for my laptop
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lock for my laptop. I can leave it locked to my desk and not have to worry. Shipping was fast, arrived undamaged, and overall a great purchase! highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro F.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really high quality cable. You can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really high quality cable. You can feel the quality of the workmanship when you rotate the combination dials.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Waage

customer_reviews.title: Good enough, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Unlike keyed models, the outside casing on this lock rotates, which may make it difficult to use with some laptops depending on where the key slot is located. Seems like it should hold up and would do the job of stopping a casual and lazy thief.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good except the skinney cable
customer_reviews.text: The cable is pretty thin, about the thickness of a usb cable. It looks like it might be cut pretty easily, though I didn't try to cut it. Everything else, the lock, setting the combo, etc. works great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lange

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH DELL 7490 (Latitude)
customer_reviews.text: This is in perfect condition but it is 100% NOT compatible with the Dell Latitude 7490. I wish I could return it, it's useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: M. DRASKOVIC

customer_reviews.title: Is not as universal as some other models. Couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Is not as universal as some other models. Couldn't use with an intended MacBook. Did fit another laptop OK. Would stay away from this unless you can confirm someone has used it with the specific model you have.
customer_reviews.author: JoatMon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Much better then other brands I used for more money.. you can actually see the numbers on this lock without the guessing game
customer_reviews.author: Shiraz

customer_reviews.title: best I have found for the money.
customer_reviews.text: this one is heavy duty, connects nicely to laptop mac or pc, handsome looking, not cheaply made, well worth the money. I am a 30 year audiovisual professional and this beast the brand names hands down. you dont have to spend 40 bucks on one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mikee57

customer_reviews.title: Combo can't be changed once set
customer_reviews.text: The lock works as it should. My only complaint is that once you set the combo it can not be changed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: OK- Supplier Is Great
customer_reviews.text: Will not work on the newer MACs. Seems slightly cheap made but I have not compared to other brands. The supplier TheCableStore is great. Buy from them and you'll get service and price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Eisenhuth

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Very easy to use. Looks like the picture. I set a new combo and attached it to my laptop in less than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Good Times

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy lock, easy to use but a little bit to heavy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Occasionally shopper

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to set combination, connected to my projector's Kensington lock slot without issue. I prefer the blue color to many other silver/black models.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelt cable locks for what they are. A way to keep honest people honest
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I like the red
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I like the red, so it shows people from a distance that the laptop is secured. I use it when I'm in public places, like McDonald's. Combination lock works. Just need to make sure it's aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my granddaughter to use in college and she says that it works great. She keep her laptop lock up at all times. She says tat she have no problems with the lock . It was easy to set the combination.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for with my purchase. The cable is top quality. Setting a unique combo was easy. The combo dial feels sturdy. I intend on using this in a public school to allow me to walk away from my computer and not worry that it won't be there when I get back. For that purpose, it serves perfectly. Not sure how easy it would be to cut through the wire, not willing to try!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Performed as advertised. Installation took no time. Very secure and strong cable. The combination lock is a great feature. The price was much more reasonable then several other security cables I considered. No hassle. Dr. Geoffrey Britt
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for a training classroom reconfigured with laptop PCs. Follow-up 13 months later. The training classroom experienced a break-in by experienced burglars. While they were unable to cut the cable, they WERE able to break the lock away from the laptop. The problem is that the t-shaped Kensington metal locking tab is secured inside the combination lock's barrel with plastic. The thieves just used a large flat-blade screwdriver or pry bar between the laptop's side and the lock to break it away. Quite disappointed that the lock was so easy to break. So I can't recommend this product for anything but security against light-fingered thieves.
customer_reviews.author: LVSENIOR70

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend to a friend! It is an amazing deal at a cheap price. You will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Vanderbilt

customer_reviews.title: This worked perfectly for a few months, but then ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for a few months, but then one day it got jammed in my computer and has yet to come out. I would invest in something more expensive to insure this doesn't happen. Now I must use wire cutters and a blade saw to remove this from my computer. NOT WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Sendt Blue Notebook/Laptop Combination Lock Security Cable
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueThe Sendt combination lock security cable is easy to install and an ideal theft deterrent. In addition to securing a notebook or laptop, it may be used with a netbook, LCD screen, plasma screen, projector and will fit any device that has a Kensington compatible security slot.

Many ultra thin netbooks, notebooks, laptops and Macbooks do not have a Kensington security slot. Please confirm your device has a Kensington security slot before purchasing.

General Features:
- 6 foot cable length
- Blue color
- 4 dial combination lock
- Up to 10,000 user-settable combinations
- Designed to secure most notebooks, projectors, LCD and Plasma Screens
- Fits any device with a Kensington security slot
- Zinc alloy material
- Superior design that prevents accidentally resetting the combination

Warranty:
All Sendt products come with a 1 year limited warranty against manufacturing defect.

1% For The Planet:
Sendt is a proud member of 1% for the planet. At least 1% of sales on all Sendt branded products are donated to 1% For The Planet approved charities.
feature_bullets: Does not fit current Dell laptops.
4-dial combination lock -- Up to 10,000 user-settable combinations
Superior design that prevents accidentally resetting the combination
Fits devices with a Kensington security slot. Does not fit Kensignton Nano or Noble wedge security slots.
